channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: I hope Android phones in 2026 fix Apple's biggest iPhone mistake
item.description: The iPhone 16 Pro camera control was a flop, but Android makers have had enough time to cook up their own version and I'm hoping it's great.

item.title: There Is Almost Too Much Anime to Watch This Month
item.description: From 'Jujutsu Kaisen' to 'Frieren: Beyond Journey's End,' here are the anime to watch in the new year.
